question: Which is the oldest Joint Stock bank of India?
explanation: A bank that has multiple shareholders is called joint-stock bank. Oldest Joint Stock bank of India was Bank of Upper India that was established in 1863. But this bank failed in 1913. Indiaâ€™s Oldest Joint Stock Bank which is still working is Allahabad Bank. It is also known as India\'s oldest public sector bank. It was established in 1865.
